TweaksGalore.TweakSectionDef.label: Power
TweaksGalore.TweakSectionDef.description: Allows tweaking the usage rate of some buildings.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Energy Saving Lighting
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Automatically turns off lighting (as long as it uses vanilla lighting code) when pawns are not in the room, if they're exterior lighting then they remain on contstantly.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Energy Saving Production
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Automatically turns off compatible production benches when not in use, may not apply to modded benches if they don't inherit from the vanilla classes.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Power Adjusting
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: If enabled, allows the below power changes to take effect. If they usually produce then it configures how much they output instead, which will instead show as a negative value slider.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows the below power changes to take effect. Requires restart for the values to actually work, as they're assigned on startup.
